about_the_game:
Birds gather for a heartwarming battle over a giant egg!

Various types of birds engage in real-time combat, waging an intense struggle to claim the egg.

As the player, you’ll command your bird army, defending your base’s egg from incoming enemies.

Strategically position your units based on their strengths and the terrain to maximize your defense.

Protect the egg until the time runs out to secure victory.

Enjoy the adorable yet determined efforts of the birds as you lead your allies to triumph!

The birds’ ambitions take flight over the mysterious “BigEgg”…

One day, a massive egg called “BigEgg” suddenly appeared in the park.

“The bird that hatches this egg will rule over all birds.”

This rumor spread among the birds, sparking an intense scramble to claim the egg—a true bird battle!

Experience authentic real-time strategy with simple controls!

Position your forces, set attack targets, and establish defensive lines—all with easy controls!
All you need is one button!

Master unit synergies and unleash special skills for a dramatic comeback!

With dynamic changes in battle depending on the birds' compatibility and positioning, enjoy deep and strategic gameplay.

Turn the tide of battle with devastating skills and aim for a miraculous comeback!

Endless Defense Mode

Test your endurance in Endless Mode, where you compete to see how long you can defend.

Push your limits and aim for a spot on the global leaderboard!

Battle Mode

Face off against another player in 2P Battle Mode, where you strive to conquer each other's bases.

Feel the thrill of intense player-vs-player battles!

Streaming Guidelines

  • You are free to stream gameplay or upload videos of the game without prior notification, regardless of whether you are an individual or part of an organization, and whether the activity is for-profit or non-profit.

  • If possible, please include a link to the Steam page in your video description.

  • We are not responsible for any damages resulting from streaming or posting videos of this game.

Note that the contents of these guidelines are subject to change without notice.

Various types of birds engage in real-time combat, waging an intense struggle to claim the egg.

name: EggRoyale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10,11
  • Processor: 64-bit operating system and processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows11
  • Processor: 64-bit operating system and processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Adorable birds are battling over eggs! Strategically guide your allies to fend off enemies in this simple yet deep 3D real-time strategy game. Enjoy easy controls, thrilling combat, and the heartwarming charm of hardworking birds. Dive into their delightful world and lead your team to victory!
